title: Inaka No Kuro Gal Jk To Kekkon Shimashita
alternative_title: 田舎の黒ギャルJKと結婚しました ; I Married a Tan Gal JK From the Countryside ; I Married a Tan Gyaru High School Girl From the Countryside
status: 田舎の黒ギャルJKと結婚しました ; I Married a Tan Gal JK From the Countryside ; I Married a Tan Gyaru High School Girl From the Countryside
description:
Description :
        Koichi quit his job and became a novelist. However, he could not think of any topic and was unable to write a novel.One day, in order to concentrate on his novel, he decides to move to the countryside to live in the atelier owned by his grandfather. Koichi is stunned by the empty countryside, but there he meets Ichika, a tan high school girl who is out of place in the countryside.She's sexually uninhibited and seems like she'll let you have sex right away, but she also has a strong desire to get married, and she's good at cooking and managing people. Koichi is attracted to Ichika, and before he knows it, he wants to make her the heroine of his own novel. For some reason, I ended up living with Ichika!!!?And so begins the life of living together with a tan gal. When Ichika invites him to have sex with her in order to have a child, will Koichi be able to suppress his rationality and successfully complete his novel?A slightly naughty marriage story about having a child.Based on the ero doujinshi by the author.---**Links:**- Alternative Official Raw - (https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/67452)
